text:
In this unit we are exploring quadratic functions and expressions and how they can be used to solve problems and make predictions. At the end of this Investigation,

What do you know about quadratic functions and expressions?

In this unit, we are using factors and multiples to explore and represent some properties of the multiplicative structure of numbers and to solve problems. At the end of this investigation, ask yourself:

How can you express the multiplicative patterns and relationships of whole numbers with words, numeric expressions, and algebraic expressions?
